#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdio>
#include <utility>
#include <cmath>
#define fi first
#define se second
#define z 100000007
#define sqr(x) 1LL*(x)*(x)
using namespace std;

pair<int,int> a[4];

int gcd(int x,int y)
{
	return (x && y?gcd(y,x%y):x+y);
}

int main()
{
	int test;
	cin >> test;
	while (test--)
	{
		for (int i=0;i<4;i++) scanf("%d%d",&a[i].fi,&a[i].se);
		sort(a,a+4);
		swap(a[2],a[3]);
		long long border=4LL*gcd(abs(a[0].fi-a[1].fi),abs(a[0].se-a[1].se));
		long long s=sqr(a[0].fi-a[1].fi)+sqr(a[0].se-a[1].se);
		long long inside=s-border/2+1;
		int ans=int(s*2%z*(inside%z)%z);
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
}
